ABOUT.introduction: Nail Lounge and Spa mission is to deliver incomparable nail care in the HEB area. We pride ourselves in providing a sanitary yet chic atmosphere. Our clients, whether first-time or beloved regulars are guaranteed a pleasant experience. This includes top of the line service and pampering that exceeds industry expectations. Nail Lounge and Spa will never compromise on quality. We want to offer our valued clients a retreat from the daily grind.

items.name: ACRYLIC FULL SET W/ FAKE TIPS & POLISH (45 MINS.)

details.name: ACRYLIC NAILS
details.description: Acrylic refill 30

items.name: FRENCH SHELLAC GEL W/ MANICURE (45 MINS.)

details.name: SOLAR FULL SET
details.description: Fill 45

items.name: FRESH ALOE VERA PEDICURE (1 HR. & 30 MINS.)

details.name: FRESH ALOE VERA PEDICURE
details.description: Aloe vera pieces, aloe vera scrubs, and aloe vera mask with hot rock for muscle.

items.name: ORGANIC CHARCOAL SPA DETOX PEDICURE (1 HR. & 15 MINS.)

details.name: ORGANIC CHARCOAL SPA DETOX PEDICURE
details.description: Activated charcoal and charcoal mask with 30 hot stone massage.

items.name: ORGANIC HERBAL ASIAN SPICES PEDICURE (1 HR. & 15 MINS.)

details.name: ORGANIC HERBAL ASIAN SPICE PEDICURE
details.description: Jade powder with ginseng, lemongrass souffle mas, and paraffin wax.

details.name: HAWAIIN RITUAL PEDICURE
details.description: Milk with coconut sugar scrub and honey. Massage with hot stone and paraffin wax.

details.name: ORGANIC MILK AND HONEY PEDICURE
details.description: Moisturizing milk and honey with milk honey salt scrub. Hot stone for massage with paraffin wax.

details.name: ROYAL VERBENA PEDICURE
details.description: Sea salt and lavender aromatherapy citrus sugar scrub, and pure Organic honey with paraffin wax while massaging.

details.name: HYDRATING HEEL PEDICURE
details.description: Sea salt with exfoliating walnut husks and pomegranate and softening serum.

details.name: MANDARIN HONEY PEDICURE
details.description: Sea salt and sea salt citrus sugar scrub for dead skin and citrus clay mask.

details.name: EUCALYPTUS PEDICURE
details.description: Sea salt with eucalyptus scrub with menthol mask and mineral clay. Cooling gel while massage.

details.category: FOR BUSY CUSTOMERS BUT WANT TO EXPERIENCE RELAXING PEDICURE
details.name: EXPRESS PEDICURE
ANTI-AGING & REJUVENATION PEDICURE
details.description: Pearl contains the following: Amino acids help building blocks of protein are essential for our bodies to function properly. They stimulate skin cells to produce collagen, promote cellular repair and hydration, and protect skin from pollution and outside elements. (Add on Gel $20)

details.name: ORGANIC DETOX  RITUAL PEDICURE
details.description: Ginger can help reduce breakouts by cleansing pores and drawing toxins out of skin. It is helpful in decreasing inflammation from a recent breakout or healing scar. Ginger also has antifungal properties and is a natural way to treat athlete's foot. (Add on Gel $21)

details.name: MILK AND HONEY RITUAL PEDICURE
details.description: Honey is anti-bacterial, anti-fungal, reduces inflammation, helps the skin to heal quickly, and contains many vitamins and minerals. (Add on Gel $22)

details.name: ULTIMATE HYDRATING HEEL THERAPY
details.description: Pomegranate is rich in Anthocyanins and hydrolysable tannins, potent antioxidants, and anti-inflammatory compounds which have valuable anti-aging effects, creating healthy, youthful-looking skin. (Add on Gel $24)

details.name: RELAX CUCUMBER MINT PEDICURE
details.description: Mint lightens your complexion, rejuvenates your healthy glow. It also protects your skin from free radical damage, a chief contributor to premature aging, helping you retain your youthful charm. (Add on Gel $25)

details.name: HOUSE PEDITINI
details.description: A green tea craze refreshing  lotion. It has a superb skin penetrating, moisturizing agents and electrolyte balancing properties. (Add on Gel $26)

details.name: DIPPING POWDER
details.description: Add tips $5

details.name: FRENCH DIPPING POWER
details.description: Add tips $5

items.name: (COLOR DIPPING POWDER FOR FRENCH ADD $5 FOR OMBRE ADD $15)
